subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay’s power was missing again Wednesday, as he went 0 for 5. But the Mets found a way to beat the Athletics anyway on a bases-loaded hit batsmen in the bottom of the 13th.
snippet: Jason Bay’s power was missing again Wednesday, as he went 0 for 5. But the Mets found a way to beat the Athletics anyway on a bases-loaded hit batsmen in the bottom of the 13th.
